text:
Awesome service provided by Stanley! Was there initially to look for a PS5 console / switch games for our new home thinking it'll be a great addition to have fun together when there's guest around.

Stanley took his time to explain to us the main differences between PS5 games and Switch Games. And that Switch games are more suitable for our scenario.

Not being heavy gamers ourselves, we're not sure on exactly what to get and Stanley have helped us in understanding what we need!

Walked away with 5 games from his store and plan to get more stuff from him soon!

Top notched service rendered! Wonderful experience! Don't feel pressured when you are shopping there unlike other places.

Went here to look for an extra controller and games for my new PS5 and Stanley did not disappoint!

Was greeted warmly the moment we stepped into the store and he was so helpful and informative. 100% would come back again!

The merchant is very fast and responsive. I bought a switch game card and theres no game card in the box so i went back to the shop and the staff there is very friendly and very helpfull to solve the issue. Very trustworthy merchant, highly recommended for those who are looking for games and consoles. üëçüëçüëç

Recently went there to buy Nintendo Switch OLED. I never caught his name but the guy that attended to me and my husband was super friendly and accommodating.

It was pleasant and I‚Äôm happy that I purchased my switch and games from here!! #supportlocal

Walk into the store yesterday evening and greeted by Stanley. Was looking for a new console after my Xbox failed on me. He shared about the PS5 Slim. And gave me views about it. He's friendly and approachable. Proficient with the product knowledge and took his time to explain clearly. Very helpful in assisting me. Thanks to both Stanley and Jason! Ended up purchasing it and walk out of the store a happy man. Rock on Gamewerks!
